name: Fairy Grim
description:
I am working on Fairy Grim - rpg open world sandbox, inspired by games like Fable, Dwarf fortress and Morrowind.
I prefer to call it's setting as "samhaincore" - mix of witchcraft and Helloween aesthetic with classic fantasy.
Lets make great game together - send your ideas and miracles (bugs) report
Support me on Patreon - 

https://www.patreon.com/murk_mill

Controls
WASD - movement
LMB - Attack
E - Pick up item / Interact
RMB - Use item (inventory)
Space - Jump / Swim up

Tab - Toggle inventory 

C - Toggle camera

R - Release / sheathe weapon
